# [Interview #1152: Calamity-Seattle, Entry #97](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1152#97)

#### Question

Could a Leecher take away stores in a metalmind?

#### Brandon Sanderson

You’ll have to find out. That’s a RAFO.
